description: Modifies the original Settings class provided by the user

user_agent.description: Custom user agent string to use for requests in the client.
user_agent.title: User Agent

max_concurrent_downloads.description: Number of parallel downloader tasks for file parts.
max_concurrent_downloads.title: Max Concurrent Downloads

max_retries.description: Number of times to retry failed API calls.
max_retries.title: Max Retries

max_wait_time.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait before quitting without a download.
max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time

part_size.description: The part size to use for download.
part_size.title: Part Size

wkvs_api_url.description: URL to the root of the WKVS API. Should start with https://
wkvs_api_url.title: Wkvs Api Url

exponential_backoff_max.description: Maximum number of seconds to wait for when using exponential backoff retry strategies.
exponential_backoff_max.title: Exponential Backoff Max

retry_status_codes.description: List of status codes that should trigger retrying a request.
retry_status_codes.title: Retry Status Codes

title: ModSettings
